name: Just Photo Cat
description:
Ever wanted to be a cat? me neither.

This game was made for Ludum Dare 48 by a team of five.

We are as follows:
Matej Jelić - https://krugisa.itch.io  

Andrej Lukić - https://itch.io/profile/andrejlukic

QGP  Development Studio - https://qgp-development-studio.itch.io

Tiny Meow Studio - https://itch.io/profile/tinymeow

Experience being a big cat in an abandoned city. 

Explore the city and take  quests from other animals .

And when you're done, please rate the game here : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/just-photo-cat
